author: gakonst
content:
Shared our view on Twitter for viz. I agree the R5 convo was unnecessary, I am evaluating the removal of EOF in a vacuum/without considering R5. 

I know it'll require us to refactor bunch of code to not hit EOF codepaths, or remove it from our EVMs, and itâ€™s something I feel we should be open to, seems doable.
